channel.title: Comments on: 2nd May 06: Public Boat Landing

item.title: By: bfp
item.dc:creator: bfp
item.description: I don't have photoshop, so have to make do: iPhoto, some CoreGaphics tools and just recently <a href="http://seashore.sourceforge.net/" rel="nofollow">Seashore</a>. In generally I'm ok with that, as the photo is what counts, and I don't have time for all the pro finish.
item.content:encoded: I don’t have photoshop, so have to make do: iPhoto, some CoreGaphics tools and just recently Seashore. In generally I’m ok with that, as the photo is what counts, and I don’t have time for all the pro finish.

item.title: By: sharding
item.dc:creator: sharding
item.description:
I like it. Very nice. I'd probably personally burn the sign to make it go completely black, but you could definitely go the other way.
Do you have Photoshop? If so, it's pretty easy to tweak that section (I also think Photoshop gives you much nicer options for B&W conversion than iPhoto does).
item.content:encoded:
I like it. Very nice. I’d probably personally burn the sign to make it go completely black, but you could definitely go the other way.

Do you have Photoshop? If so, it’s pretty easy to tweak that section (I also think Photoshop gives you much nicer options for B&W conversion than iPhoto does).
